title: size of id field was limited under 1000000
description: I met a issue that size of id field was limited under 1000000, if I continue inserting document, there's no error but insert failed. build number 4.10.3

comments.content:
Please raise issues on the user's list first, and if there's a bug then raise a JIRA. When you do, you need to include enough information for us to have some idea what behavior you're seeing, what you've tried, perhaps sample data and the like.

It's very unlikely that any code changes will be done that affect the 4.x code line so unless a problem can be demonstrated in much more recent Solr releases this will not be addressed.
comments.author: Erick Erickson
